pullRequest.title: Create Skeleton UI Component
pullRequest.description:
This commit introduces a new <Skeleton> component to the frontend UI library.

The component is built with Tailwind CSS and features a dark-mode glass aesthetic. It is fully typed with TypeScript and supports multiple variants (`text`, `circular`, `rectangular`), sizes, and line counts.

Key features:
- Wrapped with `React.forwardRef` to allow parent components to access the underlying DOM element.
- Includes pre-built composite skeleton patterns like `SkeletonCard`, `SkeletonTable`, and `SkeletonKPI` for common use cases.
- A unit test has been added to verify the `forwardRef` functionality, although the test runner is not yet configured in the frontend project.

---
*PR created automatically by Jules for task [9920981245704248060](https://jules.google.com/task/9920981245704248060) started by @g2gonee2025-cloud*

pullRequest.title: Feat: Create reusable Table component
pullRequest.description:
This change introduces a new reusable `Table` component suite in `frontend/src/components/ui/Table.tsx`. The component is styled with Tailwind CSS and designed with a dark-mode glass aesthetic, consistent with the application's theme.

The new component suite includes:
- `Table`
- `TableHeader`
- `TableBody`
- `TableRow`
- `TableHead`
- `TableCell`
- `TableCaption`

All components are created with `forwardRef` for flexible usage and are fully typed with TypeScript.

Unit tests have been added in `Table.test.tsx` to ensure the component renders correctly.

Additionally, ESLint configuration was updated to ignore unused variables prefixed with an underscore, which was necessary to resolve linting errors in existing components.

---

pullRequest.title: feat(ui): Add Alert Component
pullRequest.description:
This change introduces a new Alert component to the UI library, following the established dark-mode glass aesthetic. It includes variants for different alert types, unit tests to ensure correctness, and sets up the necessary frontend testing infrastructure.
